channel.title: Black screen after setting up native resolution (1080) and restarting the game
channel.description:
I can fire up the game and mess with the graphic settings as much as I wish, restart it and everything will be OK. But if I select my monitor native resolution (1920x1080), the game will work, but if I restart it, all it'll show me is a black screen, with the background menu music playing.
The only way I've found to play the game at 1080p is to remove the videoconfig.cfg file everytime before I start the game, then manually change the video settings prior playing
Config: Core i5 2310 GTX970 Windows 10 Build 10071 8GB RAM
